attributes.action: UK PM to send formal letter to China General Secretary to end re-education camps
attributes.additional_details: The re-education camps in China are a blatant disregard for the rights to have freedom which the Uyghurs deserve as human beings. The Government of China has no valid or ethical reason to do what they doing to these people now.
attributes.background: The PM to recognise that the camps are a violation of human rights and to assertively ask the general secretary of China to end the oppression of Uyghur Muslims.
